A high-tech device that can be installed onto a kidney or any compatible artificial kidney replacement. This particular model uses specialized mechanites and advanced filters in order to detect, neutralize and swiftly eject excess chemicals from the body. It can immediately prevent the symptoms of a drug overdose, but cannot cure the effects of long-term substance consumption.
LanguageData.BM_SpacerScariaImmunizerSupportModule.de: A high-tech device that can be installed onto a kidney or any compatible artificial kidney replacement. This particular model utilizes specialized mechanites and advanced filtration systems specifically engineered to detect and combat scaria infections, granting complete immunity to them. It is largely ineffective against other diseases and infections.
LanguageData.BM_SpacerPlagueImmunizerSupportModule.de: A high-tech device that can be installed onto a kidney or any compatible artificial kidney replacement. This particular model utilizes specialized mechanites and advanced filtration systems specifically engineered to detect and combat the plague, granting complete immunity to it. It is largely ineffective against other diseases and infections.
LanguageData.BM_SpacerMalariaImmunizerSupportModule.d: A high-tech device that can be installed onto a kidney or any compatible artificial kidney replacement. This particular model utilizes specialized mechanites and advanced filtration systems specifically engineered to detect and combat malaria along with neutralizing the parasite causing the condition, granting complete immunity to it. It is largely ineffective against other diseases and infections.

This particular model utilizes specialized mechanites and advanced filtration systems specifically engineered to detect and combat sleeping sickness along with neutralizing the parasite causing the condition, granting complete immunity to it. It is largely ineffective against other diseases and infections.
